h2.a: District Letter to Parents and Families 4-2-2020

div.p: Do you need to read these in a different language? Translate

span.style: display: inline; line-height: 18px; font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 14px;

p.span: At Buchanan Community Schools, we value the passion and efforts of our staff members in all departments who strive to make our district a great place to learn and a great place to work.

span.style: display: inline; line-height: 18px; font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 14px;

p.span: Please help us by nominating an outstanding district staff member or volunteer who goes above and beyond to do great work for our kids and our community.

br.span: Executive Director of Business and Operations

img.alt: OK2SAY: Stop the silence. Help end the violence.

ul.li: District Pest Management October 23, 2019This afternoon 10/22/19 we are having a emergency Bedbug treatment done at Buchanan Middle School. Our district-approved Pest Control Service will be preforming this treatment. If you have questions, please feel free to contact the Operations Department at 695-8400 ext. 20134.

District Fertilizing October 21, 2019Our district contractor will be fertilizing the MS Athletic Complex on Wednesday 10/23/19. If you have questions, please feel free to contact the Operations Department at 695-8400 ext. 20134.

District Pest Managment September 18, 2019On August 21, 2019, we had an emergency bee treatment done for an active ground nest at Moccasin Elementary School. On September 12, 2019, we had treatment for bed bugs in the office of Buchanan Middle School after schools hours were completed for the day. Our district-approved Pest Control Service preformed these treatments. If you have questions, please feel free to ...

District Fertilizing August 16, 2019Our district contractor will be fertilizing the HS Athletic Complex and MS Athletic Complex on Monday 8/22/19. If you have questions, please feel free to contact the Operations Department at 695-8400 ext. 20134.
